translations: 热情友好的；感觉强烈的，由衷的
<英>甜果汁饮料；<美>烈性甜酒；镇定药，不太难吃的药

sentences.sentence: I wish to take this opportunity to extend to you cordial greetings and best wishes of the Chinese Govern we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  and people!
sentences.translation: 借此机会，我谨代表中国政府和人民，向在座各位，致以诚挚的祝贺和良好的祝愿！

sentences.sentence: He had never known him to be so chatty and cordial.
sentences.translation: 他以前从来不知道他是这样一个健谈而友善的人。

sentences.sentence: One taught me reading, the other taught me composition, both of whom were cordial and strict.
sentences.translation: 一个教我阅读，一个教我写作，他们都是诚恳而严格的。
